text: Adrenal gland dysgenesis - Agenesis of corpus callosum - Agenesis of the diaphragm - Arrhinencephaly - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Bifid nose - Broad neck - Dandy-Walker malformation - Heterotopia - Intrauterine growth retardation - Median cleft lip - Omphalocele - Preaxial hand polydactyly - Proximal tibial hypoplasia - Ventricular septal defect - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
